original_text: The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery, and have vexed the poor and needy: yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully.
korean_text: 이 땅 백성은 포악하고 강탈을 일삼고 가난하고 궁핍한 자를 압제하고 나그네를 부당하게 학대하였으므로

sentences.original_text: The people of the land have used oppression
and have vexed the poor and needy
yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully
